book.title: GT &shortversion; C Common Libraries : User's Guide

chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The C Common Libraries provide an abstraction layer for data types, libc system calls, and data structures used throughout the Globus Toolkit and useful for applications that use the Globus Toolkit.

chapter.title: Troubleshooting
chapter.para: The C common libraries are intended for use by developers; there are no user-level troubleshooting techniques.
